Automattic Remote Software Engineering Internship 2026

Fully remote software internship building products in the Automattic ecosystem.

CompanyAutomattic
RoleSoftware Engineering Intern
LocationRemote
Duration12 weeks
StipendPaid; competitive internship stipend (Expected/Indicative)
Work HoursFull-time remote
Employment TypeIntern
ExperiencePrior coding projects and async collaboration

Eligibility & Skills

  • Students/new grads with strong web/dev skills and remote readiness
  • Education: UG/PG in CS/IT or equivalent experience
  • Branches allowed: Computer Science, Information Technology, Electronics, Any with coding
  • Skills: JavaScript/TypeScript or PHP, React or Gutenberg/WordPress, Git and async writing
  • Year of study: Pre-final/final year or recent grads
  • Age limit: Per company policy

Automattic Remote Software Engineering Internship 2026

Introduction

Automattic runs WordPress.com, WooCommerce, Tumblr, and more. This remote internship focuses on building production features in a distributed team. Dates/stipend are Expected/Indicative.

Program Overview

  • Fully remote with async culture
  • Pairing, code reviews, and mentorship
  • Ship to production; stipend paid monthly

Eligibility

  • Strong coding samples (GitHub/portfolio)
  • Comfort writing and collaborating asynchronously

How to Apply

  1. Apply on Automattic careers with CV and links. 2) Complete take-home/task. 3) Panel interviews; confirm availability.

FAQs

  • Paid? Yes, competitive stipend (Expected/Indicative).
  • Remote? 100% remote, distributed team.
  • Need WordPress experience? Helpful; show web fundamentals.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 12 March 2026.
